After the arrow hits, smaller bolts snake out from the target toward nearby creatures.

Lightning Arrow is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Lightning Arrow is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Lightning Arrow Tips & Notes

Does not add regular weapon damage nor allow Extra Attacks. A target with the Wet status is Vulnerable to Cold/Lightning damage and will sustain double damage from this spell.
